name: Dataland
headline: The fastest database viewer ever built.
description: Dataland is a high-performance data tool that's specifically designed for non-technical frontline teams. Dataland unifies data from across the business and allows frontline teams to Search, Analyze, and Ask AI to quickly get the answers they need, without needing to juggle multiple tools. Frontline teams - working in customer support, sales, fulfillment, operations, and logistics - get data workflows done 10x faster by using a single integrated tool that's designed to be fast and easy to use.

founders.name: Arthur Wu, Founder
founders.description: Now building dataland.io. Previously led product teams at Palantir, and operations at Oishii.

founders.name: Howard Zuo, Co-Founder
founders.description: Building Dataland, a high-performance data tool for frontline teams.

Our approach
# We build AI agents tailored to your business.
Works in all helpdesks
Omnichannel
Made to delight your customers
Knowledge layer
Our AI agents operate from the same context you expect your best support team members to use.
![Knowledge layer](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/knowledge-layer.2e4e0ef7.svg)
Auto-resolve tickets
Generate responses across chat, SMS, email, and even phone.
Hi there, can you pause my next subscription delivery?
Yes! We can let you pause it for up to 2 months. How long would you like to pause for?
2 weeks please
Agent copilot
Give your human agents a copilot that does the legwork.
![Agent copilot](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/agent-copilot-v3.c4aacec6.svg)
Loved by high-performance support teams
**Dataland has sped up my support team’s case handling by 4x,** and we feel so much better about heading into our support’s peak season this year.
![Jeff Deist](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/jeff_deist_sendoso.2c440b83.avif)
Jeff Deist
Senior Director of Support, Sendoso
**Dataland is invaluable to me and my team.** We've finally been able to identify which products to proactively remove from the marketplace. What took us one minute in Dataland would have taken us a month otherwise.
![Kristen Labit](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/kristen-labit.09091373.avif)
Kristen Labit
Marketplace Manager, Alyce
I've had cases where I've had to pull details for 50-200 orders, and I've had to step away from chat for an hour just to get all of those pulled up, one at a time in 4 different systems. **With Dataland, I can do all of that in seconds. It makes my life so much easier.**
![Amika Foster](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/amika_foster_sendoso.487e639e.avif)
Amika Foster
Senior Support Specialist, Sendoso
Dataland is an incredible tool, **the speed at which it can execute on line-item operations is incredible.**
![Elisha Amar](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/elisha_amar_gorgias.2db5be59.avif)
Elisha Amar
Partnerships Operations Manager, Gorgias
**Dataland has been a game changer.** We're getting the data we need, lightning fast, without relying on an analyst or engineer full time.
![Sarah Betts](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/sarah-betts.e1b0d7c7.avif)
Sarah Betts
Director of Support and Operations, Vizit
Dataland has been a game changer — easily saving my team weeks of manual work, and improving visibility. **It allows my team to work directly with the data they need on a day-to-day basis.** We ingest data from existing sources, filter it at light-speed, and trigger automations.
![Jordan Lange](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/jordan_lange_gorgias.fc158754.avif)
Jordan Lange
RevOps Lead, Gorgias
**Dataland has sped up my support team’s case handling by 4x,** and we feel so much better about heading into our support’s peak season this year.
![Jeff Deist](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/jeff_deist_sendoso.2c440b83.avif)

Dataland has been a game changer — easily saving my team weeks of manual work, and improving visibility. **It allows my team to work directly with the data they need on a day-to-day basis.** We ingest data from existing sources, filter it at light-speed, and trigger automations.

## Our customers
Learn how our customers transformed their customer support operations with Dataland
[![Sendoso Stock Image](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/sendoso-stock.83c5b8eb.avif)![Sendoso Logo](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/sendoso-white.becb3fb6.svg)How Sendoso support increased their tickets solved rate by 4x with DatalandREAD CUSTOMER STORY](https://dataland.io/</customers/sendoso>)[![Gorgias Stock Image](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/gorgias-stock.f219ba7c.avif)![Gorgias Logo](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/gorgias-white.c8b353ad.svg)How Gorgias saved weeks of engineering by building GTM tools in DatalandREAD CUSTOMER STORY](https://dataland.io/</customers/gorgias>)[![Nira Stock Image](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/nira-stock.cc6172ba.avif)![Nira Logo](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/nira-white.39d7e00f.svg)How Nira’s CTO delivered internal tools 10x faster for technical customer supportREAD CUSTOMER STORY](https://dataland.io/</customers/nira>)[![Lizza Stock Image](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/lizza-stock.e2c14e2f.avif)![Lizza Logo](https://dataland.io/_next/static/media/lizza-white.1bf8382f.svg)How Lizza set up their operations hub in a day, not weeks, in DatalandREAD CUSTOMER STORY](https://dataland.io/</customers/lizza>)
Security & Governance for the enterprise.
Granular Access Controls
Dataland comes built-in with role-based access controls (RBAC) and row-level security (RLS). Account admins have precise control over exactly what data is visible to each user.
SOC 2 Type II Certified
SOC 2 Type II means that our security controls are continuously audited by an independent third-party firm to ensure compliance with industry standards.
Encryption Everywhere
All data in Dataland is protected both at rest and in transit using state-of-the-art encryption algorithms. Data is secured throughout its full lifecycle.
Unlock a new level of speed andefficiency for your team.
Get started by booking a demo.
Book demo →

generated_description:
Dataland is a New York-based startup founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator Batch S20. Their mission is ambitious yet straightforward: to create the fastest database viewer ever. This high-performance data tool is designed especially for non-technical frontline teams, enabling them to unify and access data from across the business efficiently.

The essence of Dataland lies in simplifying workflows for customer support, sales, fulfillment, operations, and logistics teams. With Dataland, these teams can search, analyze, and leverage AI to find answers quickly, without the hassle of managing multiple tools. In fact, users report that they can accomplish their data workflows up to ten times faster using Dataland.

The company has a small but dedicated team of two employees, and one of its prominent supporters is Gustaf Alstromer, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. Dataland specializes in several key areas tagged as artificial intelligence, B2B solutions, data engineering, and data visualization.

When it comes to AI capabilities, Dataland stands out by offering deeply integrated AI agents for customer support. These agents not only auto-resolve issues with deep context but also integrate seamlessly with existing helpdesk solutions, providing an omnichannel experience for users.

Testimonials from customers highlight how Dataland has transformed their operations. For instance, some support teams have seen their case handling speed quadruple, while others have dramatically reduced their reliance on analysts for real-time data needs.

In terms of security and governance, Dataland doesn't cut corners. It features role-based access controls, row-level security, and is SOC 2 Type II certified, meaning their processes undergo continuous audits for compliance.

Overall, Dataland is not just about speed but about enabling teams to take control of their data and automate their workflows efficiently. To explore what they offer, you can visit their website at [Dataland.io](https://dataland.io) and book a demo to see the tool in action.
